reviews.text: Having stayed there 10 years ago, I wanted to see if the place was any better. Before I was in the top floor bungalow, and the bathroom was really bad, but the room was okay. This time, the cost was obviously more, but I stayed in one of the new rooms, not in the cottage bungalow section near the pool. Bathroom was much nicer, but the room was exactly the same, and so I was left disappointed at this. Breakfast was the same (even after 10 years), and so average. Also the staff were less friendly than before.
reviews.title: Better than the last time, but not much

likes.disliked: — The cost of a 2* pretending to be a 3 or 4*

reviews.title: Tired rooms, decent grounds, not the greatest location
reviews.text: We booked this hotel through one of the travel agents at the arrivals area at the Bali airport since we hadn’t made a reservation anywhere in advance. Ended up paying $38 for a “superior double” including breakfast. Due to the issues below and the fact that we found a far better place nearby, we only stayed one night.
